ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case', ISPICKVAL(Type,'DialSource Request'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Title,'Manager')), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Title,'Director')), ISNEW(), OR( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'New Call Campaign Request') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to the Request Type/Sub-Type selected. Please work with your Manager to submit it.
